ComicInfo.Summary:
Savage Dragon Knocks One Out of the Park: parody of 1970s Hostess advertisements that used comics characters
This Man, This Monster: The Origin of Skull!: Cole and Brent move into new office space. They find that a troll already occupies the space.
Special: Jade and Skull, trapped in a stuck elevator, recall past incidents.
ComicInfo.Writer: Scott Kurtz,Erik Larsen,Scott R. Kurtz,Erik Larsen,Scott R. Kurtz
ComicInfo.Penciller: Scott Kurtz,Erik Larsen,Scott R. Kurtz,Erik Larsen,Scott R. Kurtz
ComicInfo.Inker: Scott Kurtz,Erik Larsen,Scott R. Kurtz,Erik Larsen,Scott R. Kurtz
ComicInfo.Title: Savage Dragon Knocks One Out of the Park; This Man, This Monster: The Origin of Skull!; Special
